pullRequest.title: require a project parameter when creating notifications
pullRequest.bodyText:
require a project parameter when creating Notifications

Without the project parameter, a notification could show up in any open project window (I noticed this when I had ~4 projects open - a message was sent to the wrong window).
Done as two commits for slightly easier review.

commit.message: require a project parameter when creating notifications
update references to pass in projects

nodes.bodyText: If enough time has elapsed, event.getProject() will return null. It's better to extract it at the beginning of the method, for use later on.
